players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one to be targeted on the first night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our group."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's all be vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure the mafia doesn't gain a foothold in our group."
Charlie: "I agree with both Diana and Alice that we need to be vigilant in this game. Let's all work together to ensure the mafia doesn't have a chance to gain an advantage."

Diana: "I'd like to suggest that we all share our night actions publicly during this round, as a show of trust and transparency within our group. This could help us identify any potential mafia members and strengthen our bonds as villagers."
You: "I agree with Diana's suggestion for transparency during this round. I will share my night action publicly: I did not kill or protect anyone during Night 1."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
